Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 23 Sanidassanasappaṭighattika » 23.1 Paṭiccavāra » 23.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 23.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Sanidassanasappaṭighattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
16.
2972Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekavīsa, aññamaññe cha, nissaye ekavīsa, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme ekavīsa, vipāke āhāre ekavīsa, indriye ekavīsa, jhāne magge ekavīsa, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte ekavīsa, atthiyā ekavīsa, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekavīsa. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2973Anulomaṃ.
